scenes.name: ivory serpent totem
scenes.description:
Before you lies a raised dais with a pedestal made of shining obsidian. 
Upon the dais, in stark contrast to the black stone, sits a strange ivory totem of some monstrous serpent. 
 - take 
 - leave

scenes.name: take
scenes.description:
As soon as your hand makes contact with the totem, your vision goes black. 
Suddenly, images flash through your mind: a violent ocean storm capsizing ships and sending them into the depths of the sea, sailors screaming, and a dark shadow ominously slithering beneath the waves. 
Your vision returns to normal, and you put the totem in your pack. 
 - exit
